data.comment: Today's referee, Marco Fritz, has blown to start the match.
In Augsburg, Pierre Kunde of Mainz is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 2, Goal kick for Augsburg at WWK ARENA.
Ruben Vargas of Augsburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Augsburg.
In the minute 4, Augsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mainz to take a throw-in in Augsburg territory.
Augsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 8, Augsburg's Raphael Framberger gets in a shot on goal at WWK ARENA. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Marco Fritz awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Mainz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Augsburg's half?
In the minute 14, Can Augsburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Mainz's half?
Throw-in for Augsburg in the half of Mainz.
Marco Fritz signals a throw-in for Augsburg, close to Mainz's area.
In the minute 17, Augsburg have been awarded a corner by Marco Fritz.
Corner awarded to Augsburg.
Tobias Strobl's header is off-target for Augsburg.
In the minute 18, Mainz have a goal kick.
Free kick Augsburg.
Corner awarded to Augsburg.
In the minute 19, Marco Fritz signals a Augsburg throw-in in Mainz's half.
Marco Fritz awards Mainz a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 21, Ball safe as Mainz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Marco Fritz signals a Augsburg throw-in in Mainz's half.
In the minute 23, Can Augsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mainz's half?
In Augsburg Augsburg attack through Ruben Vargas. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Mainz goal kick.
In the minute 25, Augsburg to take a throw-in in Mainz territory.
Throw-in Augsburg.
Throw-in for Mainz at WWK ARENA.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Mainz in the half of Augsburg.
Ball goes out of play for a Mainz goal kick.
Augsburg to take a throw-in in Mainz territory.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Mainz in the half of Augsburg.
Marco Fritz signals a free kick to Mainz.
Marco Fritz signals a Mainz throw-in in Augsburg's half.
In the minute 33, Can Mainz capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Mainz are pushing forward but Daniel Brosinski's finish is wide of the goal.
Marco Fritz awards Augsburg a goal kick.
In the minute 35, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Augsburg are caught offside.
Augsburg have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Mainz in their own half.
Marco Fritz signals a free kick to Mainz in their own half.
Ruben Vargas is on target to give Augsburg a 1-0 advantage.
In the minute 43, Robin Quaison (Mainz) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
At WWK ARENA, Mainz are penalized for being offside.
Danny Latza gets his shot on target but fails to score for Mainz.
In the minute 45, Augsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Mainz in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Mainz in Augsburg.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second half has started at WWK ARENA.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Augsburg.
In the minute 47, Can Mainz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Augsburg's half?
Throw-in for Augsburg at WWK ARENA.
Michael Gregoritsch for Augsburg drives towards goal at WWK ARENA. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Mainz in the half of Augsburg.
Augsburg have a goal kick.
Ruben Vargas (Augsburg) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 50, Mainz surge into the attack at WWK ARENA but Luca Kilianâ€™s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Mainz at WWK ARENA.
In Augsburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 52, Can Augsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mainz's half?
Free kick for Mainz in the half of Augsburg.
Ball goes out of play for a Augsburg goal kick.
In the minute 55, Throw-in Mainz.
Marco Fritz awards the away team a throw-in.
Augsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 58, Marco Fritz signals a free kick to Mainz in their own half.
At WWK ARENA, Tobias Strobl has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Jan Moritz Lichte (Mainz) is making a first substitution, with Karim Onisiwo replacing Jean-Philippe Mateta.
In the minute 59, Play has been interrupted briefly in Augsburg to check on Raphael Framberger, who is grimacing with pain.
Heiko Herrlich (Augsburg) has taken off Raphael Framberger who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Robert Gumny is the replacement.
Throw-in for Mainz in the half of Augsburg.
In the minute 62, Ball safe as Mainz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Mainz advance rapidly upfield but Marco Fritz blows for offside.
Throw-in for Augsburg close to the penalty box.
In the minute 64, Karim Onisiwo gets an equalizer for Mainz. The score is now 1-1.
Levin Oztunali with an assist there.
Mainz have a goal kick.
Mainz are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 66, Iago (Augsburg) has received a first yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Augsburg.
In the minute 68, Goal kick for Mainz at WWK ARENA.
Marco Fritz awards Augsburg a goal kick.
Goal kick for Mainz at WWK ARENA.
In the minute 69, Jeremiah St. Juste (Mainz) strikes at WWK ARENA but his header is cleared.
Karim Onisiwo of Mainz smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Mainz have been awarded a corner by Marco Fritz.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Augsburg in their own half.
Michael Gregoritsch for Augsburg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Mainz have a goal kick.
In the minute 72, Mainz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Augsburg in their own half.
Throw-in for Mainz in their own half.
In the minute 73, Marco Fritz awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Augsburg at WWK ARENA.
Marco Fritz signals a free kick to Augsburg in their own half.
In the minute 75, The home team have replaced Michael Gregoritsch with Alfred Finnbogason. This is the second substitution made today by Heiko Herrlich.
Marco Fritz awards Augsburg a goal kick.
Mainz drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 78, Augsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Mainz.
In the minute 79, Marco Fritz signals a Augsburg throw-in in Mainz's half.
Augsburg make their third substitution with Noah Joel Sarenren Bazee replacing Ruben Vargas.
Andre Hahn puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
Alfred Finnbogason instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 81, In Augsburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Mainz in their own half.
Ball safe as Augsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Mainz.
In the minute 83, Jan Moritz Lichte is making the team's second substitution at WWK ARENA with Jonathan Michael Burkardt replacing Robin Quaison.
Kevin Stoger is on a sub for Pierre Kunde for Mainz.
Edimilson Fernandes is replacing Danny Latza for the away team.
In the minute 83, The away team replace Levin Oztunali with Dong Won Ji.
In the minute 84, Free kick for Augsburg in their own half.
Jeremiah St. Juste is booked for the away team.
In Augsburg, Augsburg push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Noah Joel Sarenren Bazee for Augsburg has been booked by Marco Fritz and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 86, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Augsburg.
Marco Fritz signals a free kick to Augsburg.
In the minute 88, Mainz's Jonathan Michael Burkardt breaks free at WWK ARENA. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Augsburg goal kick.
Marco Fritz awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick Mainz.
Marco Fritz signals a free kick to Mainz in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Mainz to take a throw-in in Augsburg territory.
Augsburg pushes forward through Andre Hahn, whose finish on goal is saved.
Augsburg have been awarded a corner by Marco Fritz.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Augsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 3-1.
Andre Hahn puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-1.
Great play from Noah Joel Sarenren Bazee to set up the goal.
Augsburg's Andre Hahn has been booked in Augsburg.
